001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format;
002
003import static io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.ANSIConstants.BLACK_FG;
004import static io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.ANSIConstants.BLUE_FG;
005import static io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.ANSIConstants.BOLD;
006import static io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.ANSIConstants.CYAN_FG;
007import static io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.ANSIConstants.DEFAULT_FG;
008import static io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.ANSIConstants.GREEN_FG;
009import static io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.ANSIConstants.MAGENTA_FG;
010import static io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.ANSIConstants.RED_FG;
011import static io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.ANSIConstants.WHITE_FG;
012import static io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.ANSIConstants.YELLOW_FG;
013
014import java.lang.System.Logger.Level;
015import java.time.ZoneId;
016import java.time.ZoneOffset;
017import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
018import java.util.Locale;
019
020import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
021
022import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEvent;
023import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEvent.CallerInfo;
024import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogFormatter;
025import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogFormatter.EventFormatter;
026import io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.PadInfo;
027import io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.PatternKeyword;
028import io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.FormatterFactory.CompositeFactory;
029import io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.FormatterFactory.KeywordFactory;
030
031/**
032 * Creates formatters from pattern keywords.
033 */
034public sealed interface FormatterFactory {
035
036        /**
037         * Config needed to create the formatter. Currently this interface is blank but in the
038         * future properties maybe added to access things like caching.
039         */
040        public interface FormatterConfig {
041
042                /**
043                 * Default zoneId if not specified. If not overriden the system default will be
044                 * used.
045                 * @return zone id.
046                 */
047                default ZoneId zoneId() {
048                        return ZoneId.systemDefault();
049                }
050
051                /**
052                 * Line separator for %n by default uses {@link System#lineSeparator()}.
053                 * @return line separator.
054                 */
055                default String lineSeparator() {
056                        return System.lineSeparator();
057                }
058
059                /**
060                 * Default config.
061                 * @return default config.
062                 */
063                public static FormatterConfig of() {
064                        return new FormatterConfig() {
065                        };
066                }
067
068                /**
069                 * Platform independent formatter config that will not change across timezones or
070                 * platforms.
071                 * @return config.
072                 */
073                public static FormatterConfig ofUniversal() {
074                        return new FormatterConfig() {
075                                @Override
076                                public String lineSeparator() {
077                                        return "\n";
078                                }
079
080                                @Override
081                                public ZoneId zoneId() {
082                                        return ZoneId.from(ZoneOffset.UTC);
083                                }
084                        };
085                }
086
087        }
088
089        /**
090         * A composite formatter factory expects possible children. For example
091         * {@code %keyword(child) }.
092         */
093        public non-sealed interface CompositeFactory extends FormatterFactory {
094
095                /**
096                 * Creates a formatter from a keyword.
097                 * @param config config to help create formatter.
098                 * @param node current keyword info.
099                 * @param child the embedded child in the keyword or null if non is provided.
100                 * @return formatter.
101                 */
102                public LogFormatter create(FormatterConfig config, PatternKeyword node, @Nullable LogFormatter child);
103
104        }
105
106        /**
107         * A keyword formatter factory expects keywords and option list..
108         */
109        public non-sealed interface KeywordFactory extends FormatterFactory {
110
111                /**
112                 * Creates a formatter from a keyword.
113                 * @param config config to help create formatter.
114                 * @param node current keyword info.
115                 * @return formatter.
116                 */
117                public LogFormatter create(FormatterConfig config, PatternKeyword node);
118
119                /**
120                 * Creates a keyword factory from a formatter that only cares about padding info.
121                 * @param formatter existing formatter.
122                 * @return factory.
123                 */
124                static FormatterFactory.KeywordFactory of(LogFormatter formatter) {
125                        return (c, n) -> PadFormatter.of(formatter, n.padInfo());
126                }
127
128        }
129
130}
131
132enum CallerInfoFormatter implements EventFormatter {
133
134        METHOD() {
135
136                @Override
137                protected void format(StringBuilder output, CallerInfo info) {
138                        output.append(info.getMethodName());
139                }
140
141        },
142        CLASS {
143                @Override
144                protected void format(StringBuilder output, CallerInfo info) {
145                        output.append(info.getClassName());
146
147                }
148        },
149        FILE {
150                @Override
151                protected void format(StringBuilder output, CallerInfo info) {
152                        output.append(info.getFileName());
153
154                }
155        },
156        LINE {
157                @Override
158                protected void format(StringBuilder output, CallerInfo info) {
159                        output.append(info.getLineNumber());
160
161                }
162        };
163
164        @Override
165        public void format(StringBuilder output, LogEvent event) {
166                var info = event.callerOrNull();
167                if (info != null) {
168                        format(output, info);
169                }
170
171        }
172
173        protected abstract void format(StringBuilder output, CallerInfo caller);
174
175}
176
177enum StandardKeywordFactory implements KeywordFactory {
178
179        DATE() {
180                @Override
181                protected LogFormatter _create(FormatterConfig config, PatternKeyword node) {
182                        String pattern = node.opt(0, ISO8601_PATTERN);
183                        if (pattern.equals(ISO8601_STR)) {
184                                pattern = ISO8601_PATTERN;
185                        }
186                        ZoneId zoneId = node.opt(1, config.zoneId(), s -> ZoneId.of(s));
187                        @Nullable
188                        Locale locale = node.optOrNull(2, s -> Locale.forLanguageTag(s));
189                        var dtf = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern(pattern).withZone(zoneId);
190                        if (locale != null) {
191                                dtf = dtf.withLocale(locale);
192                        }
193                        return LogFormatter.TimestampFormatter.of(dtf);
194                }
195        },
196        LOGGER() {
197
198                @Override
199                protected LogFormatter _create(FormatterConfig config, PatternKeyword node) {
200                        Integer length = node.optOrNull(0, Integer::parseInt);
201                        if (length == null) {
202                                return LogFormatter.NameFormatter.of();
203                        }
204                        return new LoggerFormatter(Abbreviator.of(length));
205                }
206
207        };
208
209        static final String ISO8601_STR = "ISO8601";
210
211        static final String ISO8601_PATTERN = "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss,SSS";
212
213        // MICROS, //
214        // THREAD, //
215        // LEVEL, //
216        // LOGGER, //
217        // MESSAGE, //
218        // MDC, //
219        // THROWABLE, //
220        // LINESEP;
221
222        @Override
223        public LogFormatter create(FormatterConfig config, PatternKeyword node) {
224                var formatter = _create(config, node);
225                var formatInfo = node.padInfo();
226                return PadFormatter.of(formatter, formatInfo);
227        }
228
229        protected abstract LogFormatter _create(FormatterConfig config, PatternKeyword node);
230
231        record LoggerFormatter(Abbreviator abbreviator) implements LogFormatter.NameFormatter {
232
233                @Override
234                public void formatName(StringBuilder output, String name) {
235                        String out = abbreviator.abbreviate(name);
236                        output.append(out);
237                }
238
239        }
240
241}
242
243enum BareCompositeFactory implements CompositeFactory {
244
245        BARE() {
246                @Override
247                public LogFormatter create(FormatterConfig config, PatternKeyword node, @Nullable LogFormatter child) {
248                        if (child == null) {
249                                child = new LogFormatter.StaticFormatter("");
250                        }
251                        return PadFormatter.of(child, node.padInfo());
252                }
253        };
254
255}
256
257class ANSIConstants {
258
259        final static String ESC_START = "\033[";
260
261        final static String ESC_END = "m";
262
263        final static String BOLD = "1;";
264
265        final static String RESET = "0;";
266
267        final static String BLACK_FG = "30";
268
269        final static String RED_FG = "31";
270
271        final static String GREEN_FG = "32";
272
273        final static String YELLOW_FG = "33";
274
275        final static String BLUE_FG = "34";
276
277        final static String MAGENTA_FG = "35";
278
279        final static String CYAN_FG = "36";
280
281        final static String WHITE_FG = "37";
282
283        final static String DEFAULT_FG = "39";
284
285        final static String SET_DEFAULT_COLOR = ESC_START + RESET + DEFAULT_FG + ESC_END;
286
287}
288
289record HighlightFormatter(LogFormatter child) implements LogFormatter.EventFormatter {
290
291        @Override
292        public void format(StringBuilder output, LogEvent event) {
293                var level = event.level();
294                String code = levelToANSI(level);
295                output.append(ANSIConstants.ESC_START);
296                output.append(code);
297                output.append(ANSIConstants.ESC_END);
298                if (child != null) {
299                        child.format(output, event);
300                }
301                output.append(ANSIConstants.SET_DEFAULT_COLOR);
302        }
303
304        private static String levelToANSI(Level level) {
305                return switch (level) {
306                        case ERROR -> BOLD + RED_FG;
307                        case WARNING -> BOLD + RED_FG;
308                        case INFO -> BLUE_FG;
309                        default -> DEFAULT_FG;
310                };
311        }
312
313}
314
315enum HightlightCompositeFactory implements CompositeFactory {
316
317        HIGHTLIGHT() {
318
319                @Override
320                public LogFormatter create(FormatterConfig config, PatternKeyword node, @Nullable LogFormatter child) {
321                        return new HighlightFormatter(child);
322                }
323
324        }
325
326}
327
328enum ColorCompositeFactory implements CompositeFactory {
329
330        BLACK(BLACK_FG, "black"), //
331        RED(RED_FG, "red"), //
332        GREEN(GREEN_FG, "green"), //
333        YELLOW(YELLOW_FG, "yellow"), //
334        BLUE(BLUE_FG, "blue"), //
335        MAGENTA(MAGENTA_FG, "magenta"), //
336        CYAN(CYAN_FG, "cyan"), //
337        WHITE(WHITE_FG, "white"), //
338        GRAY(DEFAULT_FG, "gray"), //
339        BOLD_RED(BOLD + RED_FG, "boldRed"), //
340        BOLD_GREEN(BOLD + GREEN_FG, "boldGreen"), //
341        BOLD_YELLOW(BOLD + YELLOW_FG, "boldYellow"), //
342        BOLD_BLUE(BOLD + BLUE_FG, "boldBlue"), //
343        BOLD_MAGENTA(BOLD + MAGENTA_FG, "boldMagenta"), //
344        BOLD_CYAN(BOLD + CYAN_FG, "boldCyan"), //
345        BOLD_WHITE(BOLD + WHITE_FG, "boldWhite");
346
347        private final String fg;
348
349        private final String name;
350
351        private ColorCompositeFactory(String fg, String name) {
352                this.fg = fg;
353                this.name = name;
354        }
355
356        public LogFormatter create(FormatterConfig config, PatternKeyword node, @Nullable LogFormatter child) {
357                return create(node, child);
358        }
359
360        LogFormatter create(PatternKeyword node, @Nullable LogFormatter child) {
361                var b = LogFormatter.builder();
362                b.text(ANSIConstants.ESC_START);
363                b.text(fg);
364                b.text(ANSIConstants.ESC_END);
365                if (child != null) {
366                        b.add(child);
367                }
368                b.text(ANSIConstants.SET_DEFAULT_COLOR);
369                return b.flatten();
370
371        }
372
373        public String alias() {
374                return name;
375        }
376
377}
378
379record PadFormatter(PadInfo padInfo, LogFormatter formatter) implements LogFormatter.EventFormatter {
380
381        public static LogFormatter of(LogFormatter formatter, @Nullable PadInfo padInfo) {
382                if (padInfo == null) {
383                        return formatter;
384                }
385                if (formatter instanceof LogFormatter.StaticFormatter sf) {
386                        StringBuilder b = new StringBuilder();
387                        padInfo.format(b, sf.content());
388                        return new LogFormatter.StaticFormatter(b.toString());
389                }
390                return new PadFormatter(padInfo, formatter);
391        }
392
393        @Override
394        public void format(StringBuilder output, LogEvent event) {
395                StringBuilder buf = new StringBuilder();
396                formatter.format(buf, event);
397                padInfo.format(output, buf);
398        }
399
400}
